mapper.select: select ci.classcode,ci.class_name,cti.class_starttime,cti.class_endtime,cti.class_date,cti.class_url from class_time_information as cti ,class_information as ci where cti.class_information_classcode = ci.classcode and class_timecode in (select class_time_information_class_timecode from class_room as cr0 where cr0.member_usercode = #{id}) order by class_date,class_starttime

select ci.classcode,ci.class_name,cti.class_starttime,cti.class_endtime,cti.class_date from class_time_information as cti ,class_information as ci where cti.class_information_classcode = ci.classcode and cti.class_timecode in (select class_time_information_class_timecode from class_room as cr0 where date(subdate(now(), INTERVAL -7 DAY)) >= date(cti.class_date) AND date(cti.class_date)>= date(now()) and cr0.member_usercode = #{id}) order by class_date,class_starttime
mapper.insert: insert into member(usercode, nickname, address, address_detail, lat, lng, dong, usertype) values(#{usercode}, #{nickname}, #{address}, #{address_detail}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{dong}, #{usertype})
